title: Ladybugs
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 50 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 40L
description: Ladybugs explains the differences and similarities among different varieties of ladybugs. The vivid photographs and high-frequency words support early emergent readers. The book can also be used to teach comparing and contrasting as well as visualizing while reading.
reviewWords: colors, insects, ladybugs, plants, spots, stripes
comprehension: Compare and Contrast                : Compare and contrast
awareness: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant /L/ sound
grammar: Declarative Sentences                : Recognize and use declarative sentences
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word some
